import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Meal} from "./model/meal"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; import {RestService} from "./service/rest.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { meals!: Meal[]; constructor(private userService: RestService, private router: Router,) { } ngOnInit() { this.userService.getMeals().subscribe(data => { console.log(data); this.meals = data; }) } userDetails(id: number) { this.router.navigate(['users', id]); console.log(id); } }
